Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: Command that will be used to make clips

SendToClipToTwitch.label: Post Clip Links in Twitch Chat
SendToClipToTwitch.tooltip: If this is not selected, the clip will still be made but not sent in the chat

SendToClipToDiscord.label: Post Clip Links in Discord Chat
SendToClipToDiscord.tooltip:
If this is not selected, the clip will still be made but not sent in the chat
Clips can only be posted in the discord channel you have set in your chatbot connections window. The current API is limited, sorry! Once the option for a custom channels is added, I will add it to the script.

OpenClipsButton.label: Clips Manager
OpenClipsButton.tooltip: Open your Edit Clips Page on Twitch

TwitchResponse.label: Twitch Chat Message
TwitchResponse.tooltip:
The message that gets sent into the twitch chat
{0} = Clip Link
{1} = Viewer Name

TwitchWhisperResponse.label: Twitch Whisper Response
TwitchWhisperResponse.tooltip:
The reply that gets sent if a viewer whispers the bot
{0} = Clip Link
{1} = Viewer Name

DiscordResponse.label: Discord Chat Message
DiscordResponse.tooltip:
The message that will get sent into your discord chat
You can use discord text formatting as well
{0} = Clip Link
{1} = Viewer Name

DiscordDMResponse.label: Discord DM Response
DiscordDMResponse.tooltip:
The reply that gets sent if a viewer DM's the bot on discord
You can use discord text formatting as well
{0} = Clip Link
{1} = Viewer Name

ReponseUserCooldown.value: /me @{0} the {1} command is on cooldown for another {2} seconds!
ReponseUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
ReponseUserCooldown.tooltip:
{0} = Viewers Name
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Time Remaing

ReponseGlobalCooldown.value: /me @{0} the {1} command is on a global cooldown for another {2} seconds!
ReponseGlobalCooldown.label: Global Cooldown Response
ReponseGlobalCooldown.tooltip:
{0} = Viewers Name
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Time Remaing

CommandCost.label: Command Cost
CommandCost.tooltip: The cost to use the command

ReponseNotEnoughPoints.value: /me @{0} you only have {1} {2}, you need {3} {2} to use the {4} command!
ReponseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not Enough Currency Response
ReponseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
{0} = Viewers Name
{1} = Viewers Currency
{2} = Curreny Name
{3} = Command Cost
{4} = Command Name

ReponseApiError.label: API Error Message
ReponseApiError.tooltip:
The message to send when a clip can't be created
{0} = Viewers Name
{1} = Command Name

ReponseClientIDError.value: /me Failed to get the Client ID!
ReponseClientIDError.label: Client ID Error Message
ReponseClientIDError.tooltip:
The message to send when the client ID can't be found
{0} = Viewers Name
{1} = Command Name

ReponseNotLive.value: /me @{0} the {1} command can only be used while the stream is live!
ReponseNotLive.label: Stream Not Live Response

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

ReponseNotEnoughPermissions.value: /me @{0} you do not have permission to use the {1} command!
ReponseNotEnoughPermissions.label: Not Enough Permissions Response
ReponseNotEnoughPermissions.tooltip:
{0} = Viewers Name
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Command Permission
{3} = Command Permissions Info

oAuthGen.label: Gen Token
oAuthGen.tooltip: Generate a oAuth Token for the Streamers account that contains the 'clip:edit' scope

OpenFaqsPage.label: Clip FAQ's & Change Log
OpenFaqsPage.tooltip: Open the Clip Command FAQ's Page & Change Log

OpenTwitchChannel.label: SoWhoYou's Twitch Channel
OpenTwitchChannel.tooltip: See who made this amazing script & maybe even subscribe?

OpenDisordServer.label: Streamlabs Chatbot Discord
OpenDisordServer.tooltip: Open the Streamlabs Chatbot Community Discord Server
